Title: Timberwolves' Ricky Rubio: Sharp shooting despite loss
Description: Rubio had 12 points (4-8 FG, 2-4 3Pt, 2-2 FT), four rebounds and four assists across 23 minutes in Tuesday's loss against the Bucks. Rubio didn't stand out as a scorer in this one, but he was one of four Minnesota players that scored in double digits while also displaying an accurate touch from the field -- something that isn't always the case with him.
Author: CBSSports.com
